title: NEW CHAMPION IDEA SHADOW ISLES!
body:
I think there should be a new shadow isles champion called Diablos (or Diablo), the Behemoth of Hell.
His lore should be that He is the king of death and rules the shadow isles, and has awoken from slumber to turn the world into darkness. He could maybe have a real darkness look like {{champion:56}} only in the form  that looks a bit like {{champion:266}}, only more death looking and giant.
He should be a mage. His abilities should be very dark and evil ones, like life drain, or necromancer. Maybe an undead ruler that is a little like {{champion:268}} , but turns the souls of dead minions and monsters into spirits, but instead of collecting them like {{champion:412}} they can attack other enemies for either a short duration or have a health box. Maybe his ult could be something like he turn all gigantic like {{champion:75}} , or shoot a gigantic dark fire ball that travels the map.
Riot let me know if this sounds like a good idea for a new champion, would love feedback.

The name is just a suggestion. "the behemoth of hell" however is cool and i personally think should be added if a champion like this is created.
